name: Miner Inconvenience (Bas_Hoogeboom)
description:
A submission for Miz Jam 1.

Highly advised to play in full-screen mode!

Controls: WASD or Arrow keys to move, Click or Spacebar or Return to advance messages.

Jack and Daryl roam the solarsystem as a Pilot and Miner duo. Miner Daryl runs into a bit of a problem with his pilot and, together with the Board Computer, tries to get out of this situation. 

Crash into planets, dig up all the minerals and get out before the planet becomes too unstable and explodes!

Credits:

Art: Kenney (https://kenney.nl/)

Programming, Design, Sound design: Bas Hoogeboom
